title: Prueba
body:
<!--StartFragment-->

## tl;dr

If you prefer to jump straight to the code, you can!

* Try this out on the [live demo](https://stripe-subscriptions.netlify.app/)
* Check out the [source code on GitHub](https://github.com/stripe-samples/netlify-stripe-subscriptions)
* [Watch Thor and Jason build this live on *Learn With Jason*](https://www.learnwithjason.dev/subscription-management-in-jamstack-apps)

<!--EndFragment-->
course: Estado Abierto, Políticas Públicas y Datos Abiertos
